title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 48.4 - Evidence to be presented at hearings
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 ยง 48.4 - Evidence to be presented at hearings

State Regulations

At a hearing held on a petition filed pursuant to section
48.2
(b) of this

Part, the petitioner shall be prepared to justify the proposal and to show that
the statements made in the petition are true. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
ยง
48.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
